title: Squid and brown shrimps with salt cod croquettes
description: Salt cod croquettes are very popular in Spain where they are served as tapas. James Martin pairs them with squid and brown shrimp for a wonderful taste of the Mediterranean.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz salt cod, soaked overnight and rinsed thoroughly several times in fresh changes of water
400g/14oz floury potatoes, peeled, cut into chunks
